REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2549 reute r f BC-CENTURY-BANCORP-FILES 04-08 0057

TEXT.TITLE: CENTURY BANCORP FILES FOR STOCK OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: <Century Bancorp Inc> said it filed for an initial public offering of 1.6 mln shares of Class A common shares through an underwriting group managed by Moseley Securities Corp. The company said the Class A shares are non-voting except under certain limited conditions. Reuter
